description: Your Search For The Fountain Of Youth Is Over.Get Flawless Skin In As Little As 10 Sessions The Safe And Natural Way!No More Embarrassing Skin Problems.Proven to improve skin firmness and elasticity.Who Says Your Looks Have To Show Your Age? Be ready for a picture-perfect close-up even without make up!Beautiful Skin Right At Your Fingertips.Do it yourself right at home and get results faster!A handy tool that works great for any skin type and on most parts of the body - face, neck, scalp, legs, arms and abdomen.Beware Of Some Low Quality Rollers Out There - Protect Your Skin And Your Investment.- Our Dermaroller Features Disc Technology which prevents needles from falling so you do not harm your skin.- The slim handle is longer and curved for better reach and grip so you better control the roller direction and movement.- The 360 rotating head and 10 individually rotating discs smoothly glide over your skin curves and prevent it from scratching.- Get a replacement head for only 10$ - use 0.5mm for the face and 1.0mm for less sensitive skin areas.- Our diamond shape needle tip has a small diameter of 0.22mm so it creates smaller micro wounds and surprises our customers with a much more pleasant rolling experience than expected! ( read the reviews...)Our Guarantee To You:If you do not see real Results yourself or being told by others within the first 10 derma rolling sessions, let us know and we'll refund your entire purchase price...no questions asked!Important... Please Read:We Are Sorry If We're Sold Out. Due To Increasing High Demand For Derma-Logi, We Run Out Of Inventory At Times.Order Your Derma-Logi Right Now While It's Still In Stock And Start Getting Results!
title: Derma Roller 0.5 / 1.0 - Best Dermaroller System For Younger Beautiful Looking Skin - Advanced & Safest Micro Needle Treatment for Home Use (Safer than 1.5 , 2.0 mm) with Easy-Glide, 600 Tiny Microneedle Disc Technology and Replaceable Micro-Needle Heads with 360º Rotation - Use for Stretch Marks, Eyes, Face, Cellulite, Acne, Body, Hair Loss, Scar Removal and Beauty Enhancement - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - GET RESULTS IN UNDER 10 SESSIONS Or Your Money Back!
